name: backend
description: - Create dataset of face images  - - Detect faces using ```deploy.prototxt``` and ```res10_300x300_ssd_iter_140000.caffemodel```. (Learn more about [face detection](https://github.com/aakashjhawar/face-detection))  - Extract face embeddings for each face present in the image using pretrained [OpenFace](https://cmusatyalab.github.io/openface/) model ```openface_nn4.small2.v1.t7```.   - Train a SVM model on the face embeddings to recognize faces
